mapper.select: select mrc.* from merchant_register_collect mrc left join merchant_register_info mri on mrc.terminal_mer_id=mri.terminal_mer_id where mrc.status=0 and mri.mer_id=#{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mri.terminal_mer_id=#{terminalMerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mrc.card_num=#{cardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select mrc.* from merchant_register_collect mrc left join merchant_register_info mri on mrc.terminal_mer_id=mri.terminal_mer_id where mrc.status=0 and mri.mer_id=#{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mri.terminal_mer_id=#{terminalMerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mrc.card_num=#{bankCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mrc.extra_channel_id=#{extraChannelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select mrc.* from merchant_register_collect mrc left join merchant_register_info mri on mrc.terminal_mer_id = mri.terminal_mer_id where mrc.status =0 and mri.mer_id=#{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mrc.mer_order_id=#{merOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
